price: 124. Qofkii se ka jeesta Xuskayga (Qur’aankan) wuxuu mudan nolol adag oo cidhiidhi ah, waxaana la soo kulmin (la soo bixin) Maalinta Qiyaamaha isagoo indha la'.
arabic: وَمَنۡ أَعۡرَضَ عَن ذِكۡرِي فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ مَعِيشَةٗ ضَنكٗا وَنَحۡشُرُهُۥ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ أَعۡمَىٰ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waman aʿraḍa ʿan dhik'rī fa-inna lahu maʿīshatan ḍankan wanaḥshuruhu yawma al-qiyāmati aʿmā
